summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue North and Twentieth Avenue North produced, from East Aloha Street to East Republican Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 13313, creating Local Improvement District No. 1216 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
